Detailed Description

Create Tags Request.

Member Function Documentation

- (void EC2CreateTagsRequest.)addTag: (EC2Tag *)  tag  

Adds a single object to tags.

This function will alloc and init tags if not already done.

- (NSString * EC2CreateTagsRequest.)description  

Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

Returns:
A string representation of this object.
- (id EC2CreateTagsRequest.)init  

Default constructor for a new CreateTagsRequest object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

- (id EC2CreateTagsRequest.)initWithResources: (NSMutableArray *)  theResources
andTags: (NSMutableArray *)  theTags 

Constructs a new CreateTagsRequest object.

Callers should use properties to initialize any additional object members.

Parameters:
theResources One or more IDs of resources to tag. This could be the ID of an AMI, an instance, an EBS volume, or snapshot, etc.
theTags The tags to add or overwrite for the specified resources. Each tag item consists of a key-value pair.

Property Documentation

- (NSMutableArray *) resources [read, write, retain]

One or more IDs of resources to tag.

This could be the ID of an AMI, an instance, an EBS volume, or snapshot, etc.

- (NSMutableArray *) tags [read, write, retain]

The tags to add or overwrite for the specified resources.

Each tag item consists of a key-value pair.
